metadata.title: CVE-2019-16781 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In WordPress before 5.3.1, authenticated users with lower privileges (like contributors) can inject JavaScript code in the block editor, which is executed within the dashboard. It can lead to an admin opening the affected post in the editor leading to XSS.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.3.2+dfsg1-1').
